001package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.ServiceLoader;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009
010import org.jspecify.annotations.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter;
013import io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder;
014import io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder;
015
016/**
017 * The main entry point into the Ezkv configuration library. This interface provides
018 * access to core components for loading and processing key-value resources.
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * {@code KeyValuesSystem} allows the creation and configuration of loaders that can
022 * retrieve key-value pairs from various resources such as files, classpath locations, and
023 * system properties.
024 *
025 * <p>
026 * Example usage:
027 * {@snippet :
028 * var kvs = KeyValuesSystem.defaults()
029 *      .loader()
030 *      .add("classpath:/start.properties")
031 *      .add("system:///")
032 *      .add("env:///")
033 *      .add("cmd:///-D")
034 *      .load();
035 * }
036 *
037 * @see KeyValuesResource
038 * @see KeyValuesLoader
039 * @see KeyValuesEnvironment
040 * @see KeyValuesServiceProvider
041 */
042public sealed interface KeyValuesSystem extends AutoCloseable {
043
044        /**
045         * Returns the {@link KeyValuesEnvironment} instance used for system-level
046         * interactions.
047         * @return the environment instance
048         */
049        public KeyValuesEnvironment environment();
050
051        /**
052         * Returns a composite {@link KeyValuesLoaderFinder} that aggregates all loader
053         * finders added to the {@link Builder} or found via the {@link ServiceLoader}, if
054         * configured. This composite allows finding loaders that can handle specific
055         * resources by delegating the search to all registered loader finders.
056         * @return the composite loader finder instance
057         */
058        public KeyValuesLoaderFinder loaderFinder();
059
060        /**
061         * Returns a composite {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder} that aggregates all media finders
062         * added to the {@link Builder} or found via the {@link ServiceLoader}, if configured.
063         * This composite allows finding media handlers that can handle specific resources by
064         * delegating the search to all registered media finders.
065         * @return the composite media finder instance
066         */
067        public KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder();
068
069        /**
070         * Returns a composite {@link KeyValuesFilter} that aggregates all the filters added
071         * to the {@link Builder} or found via the {@link ServiceLoader}, if configured. This
072         * composite allows finding media handlers that can handle specific resources byrs.
073         * @return the composite filter
074         */
075        public KeyValuesFilter filter();
076
077        /**
078         * Creates and returns a {@link KeyValuesLoader.Builder} for constructing loaders that
079         * can load key-value pairs from various resources.
080         * @return a new {@link KeyValuesLoader.Builder} instance
081         */
082        default KeyValuesLoader.Builder loader() {
083                Function<KeyValuesLoader.Builder, KeyValuesLoader> loaderFactory = b -> {
084                        var env = environment();
085                        var defaultResource = env.defaultResource();
086                        var variables = Variables.copyOf(b.variables.stream().map(vf -> vf.apply(env)).toList());
087                        List<NamedKeyValuesSource> resources = b.sources.isEmpty() ? List.of(defaultResource)
088                                        : List.copyOf(b.sources);
089                        return DefaultKeyValuesSourceLoader.of(this, variables, resources);
090                };
091                return new KeyValuesLoader.Builder(loaderFactory);
092        }
093
094        /**
095         * This signals to the logger that this key value system will not be used anymore but
096         * there is guarantee of this.
097         */
098        @Override
099        default void close() {
100                environment().getLogger().closed(this);
101        }
102
103        /**
104         * Returns a default implementation of {@code KeyValuesSystem} configured with
105         * standard settings and a ServiceLoader based on {@link KeyValuesServiceProvider} and
106         * its classloader.
107         * @return the default {@code KeyValuesSystem} instance
108         */
109        public static KeyValuesSystem defaults() {
110                return builder().useServiceLoader().build();
111        }
112
113        /**
114         * Creates and returns a new {@link Builder} for constructing customized
115         * {@code KeyValuesSystem} instances.
116         * @return a new {@link Builder} instance
117         */
118        public static Builder builder() {
119                return new Builder();
120        }
121
122        /**
123         * A builder class for constructing instances of {@link KeyValuesSystem} with
124         * customizable components such as environment, loaders, and media finders.
125         *
126         * <p>
127         * Note: By default, the {@link ServiceLoader} is not enabled. If you wish to include
128         * services discovered via the {@link ServiceLoader}, you need to explicitly set it
129         * using {@link #serviceLoader(ServiceLoader)}.
130         */
131        public final static class Builder {
132
133                private @Nullable KeyValuesEnvironment environment;
134
135                private List<KeyValuesLoaderFinder> loadFinders = new ArrayList<>(
136                                List.of(DefaultKeyValuesLoaderFinder.values()));
137
138                private List<KeyValuesMediaFinder> mediaFinders = new ArrayList<>(List.of(DefaultKeyValuesMedia.values()));
139
140                private List<KeyValuesFilter> filters = new ArrayList<>(List.of(DefaultKeyValuesFilter.values()));
141
142                private @Nullable ServiceLoader<KeyValuesServiceProvider> serviceLoader;
143
144                private Builder() {
145                }
146
147                /**
148                 * Sets the {@link KeyValuesEnvironment} to be used by the
149                 * {@code KeyValuesSystem}.
150                 * @param environment the environment to set
151                 * @return this builder instance
152                 */
153                public Builder environment(KeyValuesEnvironment environment) {
154                        this.environment = environment;
155                        return this;
156                }
157
158                /**
159                 * Adds a {@link KeyValuesLoaderFinder} to the list of loader finders.
160                 * @param loadFinder the loader finder to add
161                 * @return this builder instance
162                 */
163                public Builder loadFinder(KeyValuesLoaderFinder loadFinder) {
164                        this.loadFinders.add(loadFinder);
165                        return this;
166                }
167
168                /**
169                 * Adds a {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder} to the list of media finders.
170                 * @param mediaFinder the media finder to add
171                 * @return this builder instance
172                 */
173                public Builder mediaFinder(KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder) {
174                        this.mediaFinders.add(mediaFinder);
175                        return this;
176                }
177
178                /**
179                 * Adds a filter to the filter chain.
180                 * @param filter the filter to add
181                 * @return this
182                 * @see KeyValuesFilter
183                 */
184                public Builder filter(KeyValuesFilter filter) {
185                        this.filters.add(filter);
186                        return this;
187                }
188
189                /**
190                 * Sets the {@link ServiceLoader} for loading {@link KeyValuesServiceProvider}
191                 * implementations. If this is set, the builder will include any
192                 * {@link KeyValuesLoaderFinder} and {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder} instances found
193                 * via the {@link ServiceLoader}.
194                 *
195                 * <p>
196                 * Note: This is not enabled by default. You must explicitly set a service loader
197                 * to include additional service-provided components.
198                 * @param serviceLoader the service loader to set
199                 * @return this builder instance
200                 */
201                public Builder serviceLoader(ServiceLoader<KeyValuesServiceProvider> serviceLoader) {
202                        this.serviceLoader = serviceLoader;
203                        return this;
204                }
205
206                /**
207                 * Uses the default service loader to load extensions.
208                 * @return this.
209                 */
210                public Builder useServiceLoader() {
211                        return serviceLoader(ServiceLoader.load(KeyValuesServiceProvider.class,
212                                        KeyValuesServiceProvider.class.getClassLoader()));
213                }
214
215                /**
216                 * Builds and returns a new {@link KeyValuesSystem} instance configured with the
217                 * provided settings. The composite loader and media finders will include those
218                 * added through this builder and, if specified, those found via the service
219                 * loader.
220                 * @return a new {@link KeyValuesSystem} instance
221                 */
222                public KeyValuesSystem build() {
223                        var environment = this.environment;
224                        if (environment == null) {
225                                environment = new DefaultKeyValuesEnvironment();
226                        }
227                        var loadFinders = new ArrayList<>(this.loadFinders);
228                        var mediaFinders = new ArrayList<>(this.mediaFinders);
229                        var serviceLoader = this.serviceLoader;
230
231                        if (serviceLoader != null) {
232                                serviceLoader.forEach(s -> {
233                                        if (s instanceof KeyValuesLoaderFinder rl) {
234                                                loadFinders.add(rl);
235                                        }
236                                        if (s instanceof KeyValuesMediaFinder m) {
237                                                mediaFinders.add(m);
238                                        }
239                                        if (s instanceof KeyValuesFilter f) {
240                                                filters.add(f);
241                                        }
242                                });
243                        }
244
245                        KeyValuesLoaderFinder loadFinder = (context, resource) -> {
246                                return loadFinders.stream().flatMap(rl -> rl.findLoader(context, resource).stream()).findFirst();
247                        };
248                        KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder = new CompositeMediaFinder(mediaFinders);
249                        KeyValuesFilter filter = new CompositeKeyValuesFilter(filters);
250
251                        var kvs = new DefaultKeyValuesSystem(environment, loadFinder, mediaFinder, filter);
252                        kvs.environment().getLogger().init(kvs);
253                        return kvs;
254                }
255
256        }
257
258}
259
260record CompositeKeyValuesFilter(List<KeyValuesFilter> filters) implements KeyValuesFilter {
261
262        @Override
263        public KeyValues filter(FilterContext context, KeyValues keyValues, Filter filter) {
264                for (var f : filters) {
265                        keyValues = f.filter(context, keyValues, filter);
266                }
267                return keyValues;
268        }
269}
270
271/**
272 * A composite media finder that aggregates multiple {@link KeyValuesMediaFinder}
273 * implementations and searches them in sequence for a matching media type.
274 */
275record CompositeMediaFinder(List<KeyValuesMediaFinder> finders) implements KeyValuesMediaFinder {
276        CompositeMediaFinder {
277                finders = List.copyOf(finders);
278        }
279
280        @Override
281        public Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByExt(String ext) {
282                return finders.stream().flatMap(mf -> mf.findByExt(ext).stream()).findFirst();
283        }
284
285        @Override
286        public Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByMediaType(String mediaType) {
287                return finders.stream().flatMap(mf -> mf.findByMediaType(mediaType).stream()).findFirst();
288        }
289
290        @Override
291        public Optional<KeyValuesMedia> findByUri(URI uri) {
292                return finders.stream().flatMap(mf -> mf.findByUri(uri).stream()).findFirst();
293        }
294}
295
296/**
297 * A default implementation of {@link KeyValuesSystem}.
298 */
299record DefaultKeyValuesSystem(KeyValuesEnvironment environment, KeyValuesLoaderFinder loaderFinder,
300                KeyValuesMediaFinder mediaFinder, KeyValuesFilter filter) implements KeyValuesSystem {
301}
